name: Toughness
benefit: You gain +3 hit points. For every Hit Die you possess beyond 3, you gain an additional +1 hit point. If you have more than 3 Hit Dice, you gain +1 hit points whenever you gain a Hit Die (such as when you gain a level).
mythicText: You have legendary resilience and durability.
mythicBenefit: Toughness provides you twice as many hit points. In addition, when you’re below 0 hit points, you gain DR 10/epic. This DR stacks with any other DR/epic you might possess.
benefit_zh: 你的HP增加3点，且你的生命骰每比3HD高1级便额外获得1点HP。由生命骰高于3开始，每次你获得一个新的生命骰（例如当你获得一个新的等级）时你都额外获得1点HP。
mythicText_zh: 你具有传奇般的耐久力与韧性。
mythicBenefit_zh: 健壮专长提供的生命值翻倍。此外，当你的生命值低于0点时，你获得DR 10/传奇。这个DR与任何其他你所具有的DR/传奇叠加。
